flags.title: Missing Steps
flags.text: This project guide is incomplete or missing critical steps.

guide.introduction: Kind of a fun project, melding Teensyduino, RFID, and system services and AppleScript on a Macintosh.
guide.introduction_rendered: Kind of a fun project, melding Teensyduino, RFID, and system services and AppleScript on a Macintosh.
guide.summary: I love playing with projects that meld music, and microcontrollers, so I thought this would be a good one to build. The goal here is that you can build playlists, and then with RFID cards, have them played like tapes or records.
guide.title: RFID iTunes Controller
